message: sorry, here's a link http://ithinkinco.de
Here's my new blog at ithinkinco.de
Also be sure to check out https://github.com/imathis/octopress/wiki/Octopress-Sites
Hello everyone! I thought it would nice for everyone to showcase their sites built on Octopress.
Anyone else have one they want to show?
Sorry, I hadn't seen that. Thanks!
Just deployed new version of http://thestarkeffect.com yesterday. The normal blog index is at /blog/, which you can find by clicking posts off the main page.
Here's mine: http://zanshin.net. Just deployed a little while ago.

Since it's only a few weeks old now, I think more people will eventually explore and work on changing their themes. At this point most probably haven't taken the time to figure it all out yet, or they don't care.
Hah, so you're the one!
While it's nice to see sites that are built using octopress - It would be even nicer if they didn't all use the default layout :P
lol, Hopefully
Cool, well good luck when you get around to it, I look forward to having more themes to pick from soon.
Fair enough. I keep telling myself I'm going to do it, but then I get side tracked :P
Agreed. I'm hoping to work on some new themes soon. There are actually lots of folks who're changing their themes, they just haven't posted here.
Wish there were more themes by default
My New Blog based on Octopress ! http://kanthi.in/
Love the new setup steps for Octopress. Much easier to get up and running now - http://mattoncode.com
Lovin' Octopress! http://stephentudor.com
http://physiciancaredirect.com
i wrote a post about creating your own theme in octopress starting from html5boilterplate (you can use whatever you want of course): http://blog.jessykate.com/blog/2011/10/15/custom-octopress-theme/
Thanks to all the hard work put in to Octopress enabling me to make the transition from wp - http://newtriks.com
Mine: http://jaydonnell.com
http://noiseandheat.com/ - Octopress is awesome. And it involves a cephalopod. Double awesome.
